## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Security

- [ ] No sensitive information (passwords, API keys, etc.) is committed
- [ ] Security best practices have been followed
- [ ] Input validation has been implemented where necessary
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced

### Database Changes

- [ ] Database migrations have been created (if applicable)
- [ ] Migration tested on development database
- [ ] Rollback plan documented (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] README.md updated (if applicable)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated
- [ ] Inline code documentation added/updated
- [ ] Architecture documentation updated (if applicable)

### Dependencies

- [ ] No new dependencies added
- [ ] OR: New dependencies are justified and documented
- [ ] Dependencies are pinned to specific versions
- [ ] Security scan passed for new dependencies
